Unity Battle Special
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Unity Battle Special
By Elf* on Saturday, August 1, 2009 - 10:27 am:

I've noticed that there isn't much on this, and while facing Pivorus today I noticed some interesting things
about it.

First, it was triggered after four hits from my Ducken and one miss from Pivorus, so the five hits/misses
can be a combined effort. Secondly, Pivorus' guts went extremely slow while it was triggered, at roughly
half speed. It also went after literally one second, as soon as Pivorus used a move (which sadly missed
before I could get anything else on it).

This is all that I'm aware of, but I couldn't find anything on it at all, so I hope this helps!

By Kotuza on Thursday, August 20, 2009 - 11:00 am:

Still strikes me as odd that we don't know what Unity does after 10 years.

By Elf* on Friday, August 21, 2009 - 03:55 am:

Yeah me too, and after another face-off with Pivorus yesterday damage also seems to be haleved. A triple shots
did 13 damage beforehand, then after 5 consecutive hits on it (and unity activated) it used triple shots again.
It did 13 damage again, but this time on a critical hit.

By lileave on Monday, August 31, 2009 - 09:26 pm:

So, you've observed that Unity halves the damage it gives, drastically slows its guts regen, and doesn't increase its accuracy?
I'll have to take a closer look next time I play against Pivorus (which should be tonight, =P). It must have something good going for it...

By Anzer D. Fone on Friday, October 9, 2009 - 03:37 am:

I WOULD like to experiment on my emulator... if only it would stop hating me by getting errors after selecting the Rest command.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 24, 2012 - 08:01 pm:

We have an answer, I updated the battle specials chart. Less exciting than one would imagine. A fan messaged me on FaceBook:

"I think Ive found what the Colourpandoras special combat ability does in MR2 with the help of the Save State function on an emulator.

Brace yourself, it seems useless. The only effects I can see after loading the save state over 100 times?

Increased arena move speed and lowered guts regen"

I hope that my change to the chart accurately reflects his comments.
